title: How to Sort Your Bookmarks Differently on Yelp

steps.headline: Open your web browser.
Visit the Yelp webpage.
steps.description: Once the page displays, there are many areas of the page, as well as several text fields to find your item.

steps.headline: Log in to your Yelp page, with your Yelp credentials.
Locate the About Me tab near the top of the page.
Click the "Bookmarks" sub-tab.
steps.description: After clicking, shortly thereafter, you'll see the page you'll need.

steps.headline: Locate the area of the page labeled Sort By.
steps.description:
You'll then see you have 2 total ways of how to sort your listings. This listing will be just above the first bookmarked business you have on file. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/ab\/Sort-Your-Bookmarks-Differently-on-Yelp-Step-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/ab\/Sort-Your-Bookmarks-Differently-on-Yelp-Step-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Click the "Name" or "Rating" or "Number of Reviews" to Sort by these, if "Date Added" does not work for you.
Click the "Date Added" (again) if the sort order does not work for you.
steps.description:
You can do the same to sort ascending/descending on the other sort orders, after clicking the item. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/a0\/Sort-Your-Bookmarks-Differently-on-Yelp-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/a0\/Sort-Your-Bookmarks-Differently-on-Yelp-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Download, install and open the Yelp app for your Android device, through the Google Play Store app (if you haven't done so already).
Login to your Yelp account, using your Yelp credentials.
Tap the Bookmarks icon from the center portion of the screen.
Tap the Sort option.
steps.description: You'll then be prompted with the only 3 options from which you can choose your bookmarks from.

steps.headline: Understand what each of the choices does.
steps.description: "Distance from Me" (Yelp default) will sort them (using the GPS sensor) into imaginary circles of distance from the phone to the address written on the business' page. "Alphabetically" will sort them in A to Z order. There is currently no option to sort them in Z to A order (as Yelp finds this useless, and feels A to Z order is more important to it's users). "Date Added" will sort them in order of the date and time the item was added to your Yelp account.

steps.headline: Tap the sorting option of your choice, and review it's result.
steps.description: Repeat, choosing another option, if you didn't find the newest sorting option come to be the best option chosen.

steps.headline: Download, install and open  the Yelp app for your iPhone App Store app, if you haven't already done so.
Login to the Yelp for iPhone app, with your Yelp credentials, if you haven't done so already.
Locate and tap the "Bookmarks" button from the More button on the black bar at the bottom of the screen.
steps.description: Tap the Bookmarks option which is at the very top of the list.

steps.headline: Tap the Sort button from near the top.
steps.description: option. You'll then be prompted with the only 3 options from which you can choose your bookmarks from.

steps.headline: Understand what each of the choices does.
steps.description: Tap the sorting option of your choice, when you understand these choices. Distance from Me will sort them (using the GPS sensor) into imaginary circles of distance from the phone to the address written on the business' page. Alphabetically will sort them in A to Z order. There is currently no option to sort them in Z to A order (as Yelp finds this useless, and feels A to Z order is more important to it's users). Date Added will sort them in order of the date and time the item was added to your Yelp account.

steps.headline: Allow your bookmarks to synchronize, to ensure all business's have been added correctly.
steps.description: To be sure, synchronize the app's bookmarks yourself, by pulling down on the area from the top item with a downwards motion.

"} Via the Android App Download, install and open the Yelp app for your Android device, through the Google Play Store app (if you haven't done so already). Login to your Yelp account, using your Yelp credentials. Tap the Bookmarks icon from the center portion of the screen. Tap the Sort option. You'll then be prompted with the only 3 options from which you can choose your bookmarks from. Understand what each of the choices does. "Distance from Me" (Yelp default) will sort them (using the GPS sensor) into imaginary circles of distance from the phone to the address written on the business' page. "Alphabetically" will sort them in A to Z order. There is currently no option to sort them in Z to A order (as Yelp finds this useless, and feels A to Z order is more important to it's users). "Date Added" will sort them in order of the date and time the item was added to your Yelp account. Tap the sorting option of your choice, and review it's result. Repeat, choosing another option, if you didn't find the newest sorting option come to be the best option chosen. Via the iPhone App Download, install and open the Yelp app for your iPhone App Store app, if you haven't already done so. Login to the Yelp for iPhone app, with your Yelp credentials, if you haven't done so already. Locate and tap the "Bookmarks" button from the More button on the black bar at the bottom of the screen. Tap the Bookmarks option which is at the very top of the list. Tap the Sort button from near the top. option. You'll then be prompted with the only 3 options from which you can choose your bookmarks from. Understand what each of the choices does. Tap the sorting option of your choice, when you understand these choices. Distance from Me will sort them (using the GPS sensor) into imaginary circles of distance from the phone to the address written on the business' page. Alphabetically will sort them in A to Z order. There is currently no option to sort them in Z to A order (as Yelp finds this useless, and feels A to Z order is more important to it's users). Date Added will sort them in order of the date and time the item was added to your Yelp account. Allow your bookmarks to synchronize, to ensure all business's have been added correctly. To be sure, synchronize the app's bookmarks yourself, by pulling down on the area from the top item with a downwards motion.

After clicking, shortly thereafter, you'll see the page you'll need.
Locate the area of the page labeled Sort By.
You'll then see you have 2 total ways of how to sort your listings.
This listing will be just above the first bookmarked business you have on file.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/a0\/Sort-Your-Bookmarks-Differently-on-Yelp-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/a\/a0\/Sort-Your-Bookmarks-Differently-on-Yelp-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

\n<\/p><\/div>"} Via the Android App Download, install and open the Yelp app for your Android device, through the Google Play Store app (if you haven't done so already).
Login to your Yelp account, using your Yelp credentials.
Tap the Bookmarks icon from the center portion of the screen.
Tap the Sort option.
You'll then be prompted with the only 3 options from which you can choose your bookmarks from.
Understand what each of the choices does.
"Distance from Me" (Yelp default) will sort them (using the GPS sensor) into imaginary circles of distance from the phone to the address written on the business' page.
"Alphabetically" will sort them in A to Z order.
There is currently no option to sort them in Z to A order (as Yelp finds this useless, and feels A to Z order is more important to it's users).
"Date Added" will sort them in order of the date and time the item was added to your Yelp account.
Tap the sorting option of your choice, and review it's result.
Repeat, choosing another option, if you didn't find the newest sorting option come to be the best option chosen.
Via the iPhone App Download, install and open  the Yelp app for your iPhone App Store app, if you haven't already done so.
Login to the Yelp for iPhone app, with your Yelp credentials, if you haven't done so already.
Locate and tap the "Bookmarks" button from the More button on the black bar at the bottom of the screen.
Tap the Bookmarks option which is at the very top of the list.
Tap the Sort button from near the top.
option.
You'll then be prompted with the only 3 options from which you can choose your bookmarks from.
Understand what each of the choices does.
Tap the sorting option of your choice, when you understand these choices.
Distance from Me will sort them (using the GPS sensor) into imaginary circles of distance from the phone to the address written on the business' page.
Alphabetically will sort them in A to Z order.
There is currently no option to sort them in Z to A order (as Yelp finds this useless, and feels A to Z order is more important to it's users).
Date Added will sort them in order of the date and time the item was added to your Yelp account.
Allow your bookmarks to synchronize, to ensure all business's have been added correctly.
To be sure, synchronize the app's bookmarks yourself, by pulling down on the area from the top item with a downwards motion.
